verbose_text: Another possible modifying factor is the folic acid deficiency, in the presence of oral biofilm, this may exacerbate gingival inflammation and thereby promote GE.8, 9 Folic acid supplements have been shown to reduce the recurrence of gingival overgrowth in phenytoin induced GE following gingivectomy.9, 10 Our patient received vitamin D and folic acid supplements to address his deficiency, which could potentially reduce the risk of recurrence.
